Articles.Content:
^Yikes! I hate murder dreams, whichever end I’m on. 

Last night there was an enormous metallic millipede, probably 50’ wide and a half a mile long shuddering on a grassy hillside. I was sitting in a beached tugboat across from an old bearded sorcerer with one bloodshot eye who was trying to animate the millipede, but he was struggling, so thousands of mud-soaked medieval looking people were pushing it up the hill. It was an assault on an ancient looking sun god sitting at the top humming so loudly the air shook.
Last night I dreamt I was late for class because I had been building a powerful laser gun.
Instead of the gauntlet, Thanos had the Lost Ark and used it to unleash hell onto Earth, boil the oceans and replace them with oil. Also a spider turned into a dog.

I had a dream where my current piano teacher and her boss were physically and verbally fighting  in the cafeteria of my high school because the piano teacher was going to be fired.

I guess it was because I had 3 piano teachers this school year-one who left after only two weeks, then a long-term sub until the middle of the year, then the current one.

A few weeks ago i had one of the craziest "dreams" i ever experienced.

It was weekend, i woke up as usual. I turned on my computer and decided to play some Apex and then some Kerbal. I played several hours and designed a whole mission when i suddenly heard a beeping noise and wondered whats going on and thats when i woke up. I sat in my bed and i was sooo confused because the dream felt so real.

I ended up designing the whole mission just like i did it the dream and the day felt very weird because i had deja vus all day

> 
> 
> 22 hours ago, OuterSpaceSimon said:
> 
> 
> dream felt real
> 

I have a love/hate relationship with overly real dreams. They're (most of the times) awesome during it, but it sucks to wake up confused and then realize it wasn't.
Count Dooku needed my help to fend off a murderous 7-8 foot tall Furby.
I was archduke ferdinand. I started the first world war.
Go to Vegas Casino ![&)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png "&)")

There was a mustard flood caused by a magic snake, similar in devastation and viscosity to the Great Molasses Flood. I died, but reloaded a previous save and survived by hanging onto a tree trunk that was launched into the air by the mustard.

take that, god

oswald the rabbit guy from epic Mickey faceplants into the snow

that was it.

that was the entire dream.

(Caution: Please, don't open the spoiler, it can badly affect you dream.)

Spoiler

WAKE UP!  

THIS IS NOT REAL!  

YOU ARE SLEEPING!  

WAKE UP! WAKE UP!

> 
> 
> On 8/25/2019 at 7:03 AM, cubinator said:
> 
> 
> There was a mustard flood caused by a magic snake, similar in devastation and viscosity to the Great Molasses Flood. I died, but reloaded a previous save and survived by hanging onto a tree trunk that was launched into the air by the mustard.
> 

Are you okay? All of these sound like.....

Disturbing.

> 
> 
> 11 minutes ago, Kernel Kraken said:
> 
> 
> Are you okay? All of these sound like.....
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Disturbing.
> 

Yeah I'm ok, just a bit stressed over college.

Had the most ironic dream to date a few days back.

Basically, I was lucid and decided to spawn "the scariest thing imaginable". I turn to see what spawned behind me, and there's this guy standing up. I look at him and he straight up says **"I'm Jesus, dude"**.

Instinctively I said "whAT THE F" and, consequentially, woke up. Laughed my bottoms off after realizing that's what my mind came up with, still do whenever I think about it.

**Edited <time datetime="2020-02-14T06:34:46Z" title="02/14/2020 06:34  AM" data-short="4 yr">February 14, 2020</time> by Guest**
So, you should better change your lifestyle to not see such horrors anymore.
I dreamt that I was running for president of Mars.

> 
> 
> On 9/20/2019 at 7:09 AM, cubinator said:
> 
> 
> I dreamt that I was running for president of Mars.
> 

Slightly less disturbing then your last all of your posts, and more realistic of we finally just make Elon Musk the GodKing of Earth.

> 
> 
> On ‎6‎/‎17‎/‎2019 at 10:56 AM, OuterSpaceSimon said:
> 
> 
> A few weeks ago i had one of the craziest "dreams" i ever experienced.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It was weekend, i woke up as usual. I turned on my computer and decided to play some Apex and then some Kerbal. I played several hours and designed a whole mission when i suddenly heard a beeping noise and wondered whats going on and thats when i woke up. I sat in my bed and i was sooo confused because the dream felt so real.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I ended up designing the whole mission just like i did it the dream and the day felt very weird because i had deja vus all day
> 

Reminds me of the time, I had a dream I can not really remember the details, but everything two weeks or so after I had the dream later happened in that dream. It was really strange.

Last night I dreamt I was visiting some kind of artificial lake someplace in Africa. I want to say it was Tanzania. A huge, very clean lake, exactly 40 m deep all around, surrounded by tropical forest and I was overlooking the lake from an extremely high place, far above the trees. There were more plants and a huge purple flower at the overlook. Inside the lake were dolphins.

It was the future, 100-200 years from now, and the lake served to protect and enforce the biosphere.
I dreamed the reactions were working again. Bummer.

> 
> 
> 7 hours ago, The Dunatian said:
> 
> 
> I dreamed the reactions were working again. Bummer.
> 

\*like\*
Lego Vortigaunt Elon Musk kicking S with three lightsabers is definitely worth a mention here...
Honey Combs dude dragged me to hell.
I had a dream that a baby got into my room by teleporting through a wall, and I had to carry it all the way downstairs to return it to its mother...
